languages.text: {n}Вокс-системы {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} ожесточенно чеканят бинарную трель, а {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендриты{/g} яростно хлещут воздух:{/n} "Фиксирую святотатство! Персона, уличенная в столь жестоком обращении с благородным механизмом, приговаривается к немедленному уничтожению".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс-системы {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} ожесточенно чеканят бинарную трель, а {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендриты{/g} яростно хлещут воздух:{/n} "Фиксирую святотатство! Персона, уличенная в столь жестоком обращении с благородным механизмом, приговаривается к немедленному уничтожению".

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

Персона, уличенная в столь жестоком обращении с благородным механизмом, приговаривается к немедленному уничтожению".

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tech-priest{/g}'s vox systems emit a binary trill and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing the air:{/n} "Recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism is sentenced to immediate destruction."

languages.text: {n} Los sistemas de voco del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} emiten un traqueteo binario y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} comienzan a dar latigazos en el aire:{/n} «¡Esto es una blasfemia! La persona que ha realizado este acto cruel con un mecanismo de tal nobleza debe ser aniquilada de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

traits.locale_text: {n} Los sistemas de voco del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} emiten un traqueteo binario y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendritas{/g} comienzan a dar latigazos en el aire:{/n} «¡Esto es una blasfemia! La persona que ha realizado este acto cruel con un mecanismo de tal nobleza debe ser aniquilada de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}Die Voxsysteme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} stoßen einen binhärischen Triller aus, und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} beginnen, wild durch die Luft zu peitschen:{/n} "Ich zeichne Blasphemie auf! Die Person, die einer solche Grausamkeit gegenüber einem noblen Mechanismus für schuldig befunden wird, muss zur sofortigen Zerstörung verurteilt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Voxsysteme des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} stoßen einen binären Triller aus, und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} beginnen, wild durch die Luft zu peitschen:{/n} "Ich zeichne Blasphemie auf! Die Person, die einer solche Grausamkeit gegenüber einem noblen Mechanismus für schuldig befunden wird, muss zur sofortigen Zerstörung verurteilt werden."

languages.text: {n}Les systèmes-vox du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} émettent un trille binhaire et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} se mettent à battre furieusement les airs :{/n} « J'enregistre un blasphème ! L'individu qui s'est rendu coupable d'une telle cruauté à l'encontre d'un noble mécanisme doit être condamné à une destruction immédiate. »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les systèmes-vox du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} émettent un trille binhaire et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrites{/g} se mettent à battre furieusement les airs :{/n} « J'enregistre un blasphème ! L'individu qui s'est rendu coupable d'une telle cruauté à l'encontre d'un noble mécanisme doit être condamné à une destruction immédiate. »

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}的音阵系统发出了二进制颤音，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}愤怒地在空气中挥舞着。{/n}“我在此记录亵渎神明的行为！对高贵的机器犯下如此残忍罪行的人，必须被立刻处决。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}的音阵系统发出了二进制颤音，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}愤怒地在空气中挥舞着。{/n}“我在此记录亵渎神明的行为！对高贵的机器犯下如此残忍罪行的人，必须被立刻处决。”

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は、ヴォクスシステムから2進数でキュルキュルと音を立てて、{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}を激しく空中で振り乱し始める。{/n}「冒涜を記録した！高貴な機械に対する残虐行為の罪を背負ったものは、今すぐ破壊処理の刑に処さねばならない」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s vox-systems emit a binharic trill, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrites{/g} start furiously lashing at the air:{/n} "I am recording blasphemy! The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は、ヴォクスシステムから2進数でキュルキュルと音を立てて、{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}を激しく空中で振り乱し始める。{/n}「冒涜を記録した！ 高貴な機械にそのような残虐行為をして罪を背負ったものは、今すぐ破壊処理の刑に処さねばならない」

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} voks sisteminden ikilidilde bir haykırış çıkıyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritleri{/g} havayı öfkeyle kamçılamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Küfür addediyorum! Soylu bir mekanizmaya karşı böylesi bir zulümden kabahatli kişi, derhâl imha cezasına çarptırılmalı!"

The person found guilty of such cruelty to a noble mechanism must be sentenced to immediate destruction."
